name: Barrel Knight
description:
When they just thought they had conquered the mighty Infinite Tower, this fierce knight got their legs stuck in a barrel and ended up tumbling down the stairs! Spin some specific parts of the tower to create a better path for your knight and go as far as you can!

Try to collect coins and power-ups to make the fall as smooth as possible! But be aware of the enemies and traps that stand in your path.

Unlock and improve power-ups in the shop, and buy new colors for your magnificent panache!

This game was made by a team of 7 students in the spawn of 2 weeks for a school project with mobile game developer OhBiBi.
